divs: Sighting DetailsComing home from Birthday Party 3-10-12 Time was about 9:30 PM Clear skies. We were driving south on Route 52(Briggs)near Joliet me my wife and Kids ages 11,14 & 16 notice in the sky a very bright Blue object moving at a high rate of speed heading west, what we also notice it was being followed by jet plane as we which in awe, we then notice the object accelerate disappear in the distance, we were still driving along route 52 about 3 miles south of Laraway road, we can see in a distance the plane was still trying to follow with no sight of blue object.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Joliet
There were no other sightings in Joliet on or around March 10th 2012
Summary: Bright Blue object being followed by Jet Plane.
